qa_pairs.answer: Hello! How can I help you today?
I'm an AI assistant here to help answer your questions!
I don't have access to real-time weather data, but you can check weather.com or your local weather service for current conditions.
Python is a versatile programming language! Are you looking to learn Python or need help with a specific coding problem?
I can't tell the exact time, but you can check your device's clock!
I'm here to help! You can ask me questions and I'll do my best to provide helpful answers.
You're welcome! Feel free to ask if you need anything else.
